item.description:
Looking for something new to do New Year's Weekend? Head on up to the White Mountains and ring in the new year with the Innitou Ski Runners.

There is lots of fun to be had up in the north country.

You can dance the night away on New Year's Eve or opt to spend a quiet night in sitting around the wood-burning stove and watching the ball drop from one of the many TVs in our rec-room. Whatever your pleasure, you will find it up here.

Downhill and Cross-Country Skiing, snowshoeing, hiking and ice-skating are just minutes outside our door and there are lots of bargains to be had at the shopping outlets of North Conway.

Private events are scheduled throughout the weekend to celebrate the new year and kick-off the ski season. Contact us for more details.

Lodging is just $20/night for guests and other optional activities are additional.

We look forward to seeing you!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Spend New Year's Weekend With the Innitou Ski Runners
